ARABIC: وَمَا يُؤْمِنُ أَكْثَرُهُم بِٱللَّهِ إِلَّا وَهُم مُّشْرِكُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Most of them do not have iman in Allah without associating others with Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Not only do they not believe in God, but also associate others with Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And most of them believe in Allah only when they associate others with Him in His Divinity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Most of them do not believe in God; they are but pagans.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And most of them are such that they do not believe in Allah except while ascribing partners (to Him)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And most of them believe not in Allah except that they attribute partners unto Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most of them do not believe in Allah without associating others (with Him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And the most part of them believe not in God, but they associate other gods with Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And most of them believe not in Allah except that they attribute partners (unto Him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and most of them, even when they profess belief in God, attribute partners to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And most of them believe not in Allah except as they are associators.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And most of them do not believe in Allah without ascribing partners to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And most of them believe not in Allah without associating (other as partners) with Him!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And most of them believe not in Allah except that they attribute partners unto Him [i.e. they are Mushrikun -polytheists - see Verse 6:121].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And most of them do not believe in Allah, but they associate others with Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And most of them do not believe in God unless they associate others.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And most of them believe not in Allah except while they associate others with Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [12:106] And most of them do not believe in God, such that they might affirm that He is the Creator and the Sustainer, without ascribing partners, to Him, by worshipping idols; which is why, when crying their [ritual] response to God, they used to say: ‘At Your service, no partner have You, save a partner that belongs to You; You possess him and all that he possesses’, meaning it [when they said it].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And most of them) the people of Mecca (believe not in Allah) deep in their hearts; it is also said that this means: they do not believe in the worship of Allah (except that they attribute partners (unto Him)) openly.
